name: C Programming Basics
details: Get started with the basic of the C programming language. Learn about variables,data types, loops & basic programming concepts.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the world of algorithms and algorithmic thinking. Learn how to solve complex problems efficiently along with programming basics.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Discover C++ and its applications in data structures and algorithms. Build a strong foundation for competitive programming.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn essential data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks. Understand their implementation and usage.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Dive into object-oriented programming using Python. Explore classes, objects, data structures such as array and inheritance .

name: Software Engineering
details: Gain insights into the principles of software engineering. Learn about software development methodologies, and best practices.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing technologies. Learn how to deploy and manage cloud-based applications.

name: Database with MySQL
details: Master the fundamentals of database management with MySQL. Learn to design and query relational databases.

name: Problem-Solving Strategies
details: Develop problem-solving skills and strategies for tackling challenging programming and algorithmic problems.
